SPOCK (Speculoos Observatories sChedule maKer) is a python package developed to handle the planification of observation of the SPECULOOS telescopes. The project SPECULOOS -Search for habitable Planets EClipsing ULtra-cOOl Stars ‚Äì searches for potentially habitable exoplanets around the smallest and coolest stars of the solar neighborhood Link to site.
